value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.

value.title: Optimize a model for performance in Power BI
value.excerpt: Performance optimization, also known as performance tuning, involves making changes to the current state of the data model so that it runs more efficiently. Essentially, when your data model is optimized, it performs better.

value.title: Convert HTML to **formatted** text in Power Query
value.excerpt: Let me show you how to convert html on a power query column into formatted text.  Join this channel membership to get access to all the recorded bites as they become available: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw/join  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
